page.title: 16Local Street Games
page.content: People who are lucky enough to own a computer may play on it.But we still play a few old games like Tin Can Tommy,hide-and-seek and Tig.we play these games for something to do or to work up an appetite before a meal. {Whipit Stop}is similar to hide-and-seekbut when you are caught you wait.You are able to move around.If another person,not caught, comes and tigs you,you can run and hide again. {Dungeons and Dragons}is like tig but when you are caught you must stand in a marked area unable to move and with people guarding you called Dragons.The place you are in is called a Dungeon.You can also escape if someone,not caught,touches you though such a person runs the risk of being trapped by Dragons.
